answers.text:
Hi Roger,
I have been able to find a few templates for subrecipient agreements. All of the templates seem to follow the same format, with slight variations.
Ohio Department of Development template for Neighborhood Stabilization Program: http://bit.ly/fEHA4d
California Department of Housing and Community Development for CDBG: http://bit.ly/dL21EZ
Ashtabula County, Ohio Neighborhood Stabilization Program: http://bit.ly/fPnN5R
I hope these are helpful!
Amanda Dodge
International City/County Management Association
Knowledge Network Intern
202-962-3699
adodge@icma.org

author: Roger Kolman
text: The City has recently received a federal grant that is being passed thru to a local non-profit agency.  Currently, we do not have a standard "sub-recipient" agreement that can be utilized to communicate the federal, state and local requirements that go along with a federal pass-thru grant.  Does anyone have such standard agreement that they regularly utilize to contract with sub-recipients on federal grants?
title: Sub recipient Agreements
